item.title: Pope Leo XIV calls for peace in Ukraine and Gaza, saying 'Never again war'
item.description: In his first Sunday noon blessing as pontiff, Pope Leo XIV called for a just and lasting peace in Ukraine and an immediate ceasefire in Gaza with the release of hostages and delivery of aid

item.title: I wanted to know why my mom was so hard on us kids growing up. So I finally asked
item.description: "Work hard my children." That's what my mother always told me and my siblings. All I wanted to do was play hide and seek and netball. Years later, we had a good talk about her parenting style. Essay by Esther Ngumbi. Editor: Marc Silver. Publishing Sunday morning. Adapted from an earlier essay by Esther Ngumbi from a few years ago.

item.title: India and Pakistan ceasefire shaken by overnight fighting in disputed Kashmir region
item.description: People on both sides of the Line of Control, which divides the territory, reported heavy exchanges of fire between Indian and Pakistani troops. The fighting subsided by Sunday morning.

item.title: Federal employee unions fight for survival as Trump tries to eviscerate them
item.description: In 1978, Congress gave federal workers the right to organize and bargain collectively, finding it in the public interest. Now Trump wants to end those labor rights for most of the federal workforce.

item.title: Zelenskyy welcomes Russian overtures, but says ceasefire must come before peace talks
item.description: Zelenskyy called Russian President Vladimir Putin's offer to start talks without a ceasefire a "positive sign," and said that "the entire world has been waiting for this for a very long time."

item.title: Tariff troubles: A rubber duck museum is migrating to Canada to stay afloat
item.description: Upset by tariffs and President Trump's insistence on making them the 51st state, Canadians are boycotting the U.S. Without them, the Rubber Duck Museum can't stay afloat. So, it's moving to Canada.

item.title: Slightly unusual 'atmospheric river' event to hit Southeast U.S.
item.description: The National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration says an "atmospheric river" event is set to hit Florida and other parts of the Southeast. The weather event typically occurs in the West.

item.title: He graduated from college at age 79. A campus tragedy inspired him to enroll
item.description: The Vietnam veteran and former businessman got his diploma from South Carolina State University on Friday. He signed up for classes after hearing about the police killing of protesting students in 1968.
